member.name: T:Windows.ApplicationModel.Search.ISearchPaneQueryChangedEventArgs
member.summary: Provides data for a querychanged event that is associated with a searchPane object.
member.deprecated: ISearchPaneQueryChangedEventArgs may be altered or unavailable for releases after Windows 10.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Search.ISearchPaneQueryChangedEventArgs.Language
member.summary: The Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF) language tag (BCP 47 standard) that identifies the language currently associated with the user's text input device.
member.returns: The Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF) BCP 47 standard language tag.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Search.ISearchPaneQueryChangedEventArgs.LinguisticDetails
member.summary: An object that provides information about query text that the user is entering through an Input Method Editor (IME).
member.returns: An object that provides information about query text.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Search.ISearchPaneQueryChangedEventArgs.QueryText
member.summary: The text in the search box when the querychanged event fired.
member.returns: The current query text.

member.name: T:Windows.ApplicationModel.Search.SearchPane
member.summary: Deprecated. Use the Windows.UI.Xaml.Controls.SearchBox (XAML) or the WinJS.UI.SearchBox (HTML) control instead. Represents and manages the search pane that opens when a user activates the Search charm.
member.deprecated: SearchPane may be altered or unavailable for releases after Windows 10.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Search.SearchPane.Language
member.summary: The Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF) language tag (BCP 47 standard) that identifies the language currently associated with the user's text input device.
member.returns: The Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF) BCP 47 standard language tag.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Search.SearchPane.PlaceholderText
member.summary: The placeholder text in the search box when the user hasn't entered any characters.
member.returns: The placeholder text to display in the search box.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Search.SearchPane.QueryText
member.summary: The current text in the search box of the search pane.
member.returns: The current query text. If the search pane was not used, this is an empty string.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Search.SearchPane.SearchHistoryContext
member.summary: A string that identifies the context of the search and is used to store the user's search history with the app.
member.returns: The search history context string.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Search.SearchPane.SearchHistoryEnabled
member.summary: Indicates whether the user's previous searches with the app are automatically tracked and used to provide suggestions.
member.returns: True if the user's search history is automatically tracked and used to provide suggestions; otherwise false. The default value is true.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Search.SearchPane.ShowOnKeyboardInput
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the user can open the search pane by typing.
member.returns: True if the user can type to search. Otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Search.SearchPane.Visible
member.summary: Indicates whether the search pane is open.
member.returns: True if the search pane is being displayed; otherwise false.

member.name: E:Windows.ApplicationModel.Search.SearchPane.QueryChanged
member.summary: Fires when the user changes the text in the search box.

member.name: E:Windows.ApplicationModel.Search.SearchPane.QuerySubmitted
member.summary: Fires when the user submits the text in the search box and the app needs to display search results.

member.name: E:Windows.ApplicationModel.Search.SearchPane.ResultSuggestionChosen
member.summary: Fires when the user selects one of the suggested results that was provided by the app and displayed in the search pane.

member.name: E:Windows.ApplicationModel.Search.SearchPane.SuggestionsRequested
member.summary: Fires when the user's query text changes and the app needs to provide new suggestions to display in the search pane.

member.name: E:Windows.ApplicationModel.Search.SearchPane.VisibilityChanged
member.summary: Fires when the user opens or closes the search pane.

member.name: M:Windows.ApplicationModel.Search.SearchPane.GetForCurrentView
member.summary: Retrieves an instance of the search pane from which users can search within the app.
member.deprecated: ISearchPaneStatics may be altered or unavailable for releases after Windows 10.
member.returns: An instance of the search pane, which provides a consistent, touch-friendly search box and optional search suggestions for searching within the current application.

member.name: M:Windows.ApplicationModel.Search.SearchPane.HideThisApplication
member.summary: Hides the current app's UI.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Search.SearchPaneSuggestionsRequest.IsCanceled
member.summary: Indicates whether the request for suggestions to display is canceled.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Search.SearchPaneSuggestionsRequest.SearchSuggestionCollection
member.summary: The suggestions to display in the search pane for the current query. Apps provide suggestions to display by appending them to this searchSuggestionCollection object.
member.returns: The suggestions to display. Apps provide suggestions by appending them to this searchSuggestionCollection object.

member.summary: Retrieves an object that lets an app respond to a request for suggestions asynchronously.
member.deprecated: ISearchPaneSuggestionsRequest may be altered or unavailable for releases after Windows 10.
member.returns: An object that lets an app signal when it has fulfilled the request for search suggestions.

member.name: T:Windows.ApplicationModel.Search.SearchPaneSuggestionsRequestDeferral
member.summary: Enables the app to signal when it has finished populating a searchSuggestionCollection object while handling the suggestionsrequested event. Apps should use a deferral if and only if they need to respond to a request for suggestions asynchronously.
member.deprecated: SearchPaneSuggestionsRequestDeferral may be altered or unavailable for releases after Windows 10.
